Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;Lantern Stick^reset; at the ^orange;Foraging Table^reset; and return to ^green;Welchie^reset;.
Now you'll be able to slap that on your head and travel without needing to hold a flashlight! Also, I found some ^orange;Plant Fibre^reset; in storage. Why don't you take it?

Sometimes, the darkness can prove a horrible hindrance. That's where tha ^orange;Oil^reset; I got ya ter make comes in: You can craft a ^orange;Lantern Stick^reset; to see in the dark at a ^orange;Foraging Station^reset;. ^green;Research^reset; into ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset; to learn how.
